structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: In order to prevent crime, protect the city's retail trade, maintain property values and generally to protect and preserve the quality of its neighborhoods, commercial districts, and the quality of urban life, a city, by ordinance, may regulate the location of adult establishments by dispersing them throughout the city or by concentrating them in one (1) area.

"Adult establishment", as used in this section, shall include, but not be limited to, the following:
Adult bookstore;
Adult motion picture theater; or
Adult mini motion picture theater.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 425, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 500, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.
